title: 5000SQFT! Luxury Loft Duplex, 5 Bed 4 Bath GEM
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 228369961', 'Rent: $5,400 / Month', 'Beds: 5', 'Bath: 5', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Right where Ukrainian Village and Humboldt Park converge, this is a rare opportunity to rent a condo-quality finished, MASSIVE 5000 sq ft of space.', "Newly gut-rehabbed owner's unit with the whole 9 yards:", '+ 5 king sized bedrooms (3 on top level, 2 in basement), 4.5 bathrooms', '+ Huge luxury kitchen with 42" cabinets, peninsula, backsplash and Commercial grade Kitchenaid appliances', '+ TONS of storage', '+ Luxury finishes throughout', '+ Nest thermostat central heat and air', '+ Private enclosed patio in back', '+ Extra high ceilings', '+ Tons of Exposed brick and arched windows', '+ Absolutely unprecedented amount of storage!!', 'Big front coat closet, big rear coat closet and huge linen closet in the center of the unit', '+ Heated Garage Parking spot available for rent', 'All bedrooms can accommodate king beds, have large closets and loads of natural light.', 'Bathrooms feature large format tiles and luxury fixtures.', 'The great room has massive picture windows and tons of space for extra sitting areas, massive dining set up, entertainment area and dog zone!', 'The unit is pet friendly.', "Location is fantastic, just a block from Spinning J, Rootstock, Cafe Marie Jeanne, Lucys, lots of boutique shops and Adam's and Sons nursery!", 'It is also a runner and walkers paradise, just 1 block away from the park.', 'This unit has it all!', '** Please note these pictures are of unit #3 similar finishes.', '**', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Balcony', 'Cats Ok', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Central Air', 'Central Heat', 'Deck', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Dogs Ok', 'Eat-in Kitchen',
